text: Selena Gomez attends "Rei Kawakubo/Comme des Garcons: Art Of The In-Between" Costume Institute Gala at Metropolitan Museum of Art on May 1, 2017 in New York City.
title: Selena Gomez's Style Evolution, From Disney Days to Fashion Forward Superstar Photos

meta_data.author: Lauren McCarthy
meta_data.description: Selena Gomez has come a long way since appearing as a young kid on Barney & Friends. Since, she's gone on to lead her own Disney Channel series, forage a successful singing career, and, oh yeah, become the most followed person on Instagram. Over the years, her style has evolved just as much as her career. In those early, teen queen days, Gomez favored girly frocks in vibrant, bold colors, often paired with a pair of statement heels. Today, thanks to a partnership with stylist Kate Young, Gomez frequently steps out in edgy, fashion forward designs that are equal parts modern and feminine. As a muse for Louis Vuitton designer Nicolas Ghesquiere, and with a new Coach collaboration due out this Fall, don't expect the superstar's red carpet moments to come to a halt anytime soon. Here, in honor of her birthday, a look at Gomez's best red carpet moments.

og.title: Selena Gomez: From Disney Days to Leather Louis Vuitton
og.description: Selena Gomez has come a long way since appearing as a young kid on Barney & Friends.
